import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../../utils/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cartIconComponent/CartIcon' import CartDropdown from '../CartDropdown/CartDropdown' import { selectCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cartSelectors' import { selectCurrentUser } from '../../redux/user/userSelector' import './Header.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN)}
{ hidden ? null : () }
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ currentUser: selectCurrentUser, hidden: selectCartHidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
